attributes.action: Stop stunts at air shows on safety issues.
attributes.additional_details:
Doing stunts is a dangerous practice and planes are not made to be doing these practices, there have been a number over the years which crash, another abroad in the last couple of days killed two more, just a matter of time before rows of houses are hit or even a school, you can never say never as proven.

Yes fly them as intended, major stress is put on the plane plus any pilot error are involved.

Air shows must be only in an area where there are no main roads and built up areas on safety issues to the public.

Let's have a common sense approach on this which should already be in place.
attributes.background: Planes are not made for this purpose
